N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 25.2 - Patients involved in work activities

State Regulations
(a) No
patient shall be required to perform any tasks involved in training, work
training or work, except in relation to his or her personal care and
possessions. Each patient shall be given written notice and oral explanation as
necessary that he or she may not be required to work if he or she chooses not
to. Patients may agree voluntarily to engage in work in the facility only as
provided in this Part. (b) Any
patient who engages in training involving work, work training, or work in a
facility shall be informed, orally and in writing, of his/her rate of pay, pay
period, the methods of determining total pay, deductions from total pay and
reasons therefor. Notes
